  <script>
   var digitalData = { };
digitalData.page = {"pageInfo":{"pageName":"","partnerName":""},"category":{"pageType":"Home"},"tags":[{"category":"subCategory","tag":"Home"}]};var pageName = "nycgo";if (digitalData.page && digitalData.page.pageInfo) {
digitalData.page.pageInfo.server = window.location.hostname;
digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageURL = window.location.href;
}var urlSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/");
for (var i = 1; i < urlSegments.length; i++) {
if (urlSegments[i] == "" || urlSegments[i] == "index.php") {continue;} else {
pageName += ":"+urlSegments[i];
if (digitalData.page.category.pageType.length < 1 && i == 1) {
digitalData.page.category.pageType = urlSegments[i];
}
}
}
digitalData.product = {};
digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName = pageName;
  </script>

googletag.cmd.push(function() {
// Enable SRA and services.
googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
});
}/*-- Global Date/Time --*/
var _sf_startpt=(new Date()).getTime();
  </script>

googletag.cmd.push(function() {
googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/61567524/nycgo.com/ProgramInterstitial', 'gpt-unit-interstitial').addService(googletag.pubads())
.setTargeting('size','oop')
.setTargeting('pos', 'gpt-unit-interstitial')
.setTargeting('url', window.location.pathname)
.setTargeting('entry','{entry_id}')
.setTargeting('categories', [
])
googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad({
fetchMarginPercent: 100,
renderMarginPercent: 0
});googletag.enableServices();
googletag.display('gpt-unit-interstitial');
});

          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="dropdown" role="presentation">
      <a class="nav-item alt-text" id="neighborhoodsDrop" tabindex="0">
       Neighborhoods

          <span class="icon icon-arrow-left">

  <header class="container-fluid">
   <div class="row homepage-hero" data-lpos="Home | Hero">
    <div class="audience-all home-hero-background" style="background-image:url(https://images.nycgo.com/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/NG-Winter-header-1920x1080-3-op.png)">
     <div class="home-hero-content container">
      <div class="overlay overlay-bg">
      </div>
      <div class="overlay">
       <div class="container">
        <div class="home-hero-image" data-slide-title="All In NYC: Neighborhood Getaways">
         <img alt="All In NYC: Neighborhood Getaways" class="img-responsive center-block" src="https://images.nycgo.com/image/fetch/q_65/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/AINYC_Vibrancy_lockup_H_white2.png"/>
        </div>
        <div class="home-hero-description">
         <p>
          New York City is open for business, and there are great deals to be found in all five boroughs. While saving on attractions, dining, hotels, museums, shops, tours and more, you’ll be showing love to the spots that make NYC so vibrant. Restaurant deals, last-minute hotel deals and more are happening all the time—let us show you the latest.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="home-hero-buttons text-center">
         <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-lg" href="/neighborhood-getaways">
          Shop the Offers
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="modal fade" id="heroVideoModal" role="dialog" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg" role="document">
      <div class="modal-content">
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </header>
  <main class="flex flex-column container home-page" role="main">
   <div class="clearfix">
   </div>

    </nycgo-scrolling-block>

     <div class="ad text-muted ad-interstitial">
      <div class="adslot" id="gpt-unit-middle">
      </div>
      <small class="text-muted">
       Advertisement
      </small>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       googletag.cmd.push(function () {googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();var widthLg = 1185;
var widthSm = 753;
var widthMd = 977;var mapSlot = googletag.sizeMapping().
addSize([widthMd, 0], [970, 250]).
addSize([0, 0], [300, 250]).
build();if (mapSlot[0][1][0] !== undefined) {
width  = mapSlot[0][1][0];
height = mapSlot[0][1][1];
} else {
width  = mapSlot[1][1][0];
height = mapSlot[1][1][1];
}if (mapSlot) {
googletag.defineSlot('/61567524/nycgo.com/Homepage', [width, height], 'gpt-unit-middle').defineSizeMapping(mapSlot)
.addService(googletag.pubads())
.setTargeting('size', '{embed:size}')
.setTargeting('pos', '{embed:id}')
.setTargeting('url', window.location.pathname)
.setTargeting('location','Inline'.replace(/\\/g,''))
.setTargeting('entry','71744')
.setTargeting('categories', [
])
}
googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad({
fetchMarginPercent: 100,
renderMarginPercent: 0
});
googletag.enableServices();
googletag.display('gpt-unit-middle');}); // /googletag.cmd.push
      </script>
     </div>

    <section class="row adspace" id="fullWidthAd">
     <div class="ad text-muted ad-interstitial">
      <div class="adslot" id="gpt-unit-bottom">
      </div>
      <small class="text-muted">
       Advertisement
      </small>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       googletag.cmd.push(function () {googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();var widthLg = 1185;
var widthSm = 753;
var widthMd = 977;var mapSlot = googletag.sizeMapping().
addSize([widthMd, 0], [970, 250]).
addSize([0, 0], [300, 250]).
build();if (mapSlot[0][1][0] !== undefined) {
width  = mapSlot[0][1][0];
height = mapSlot[0][1][1];
} else {
width  = mapSlot[1][1][0];
height = mapSlot[1][1][1];
}if (mapSlot) {
googletag.defineSlot('/61567524/nycgo.com/Homepage', [width, height], 'gpt-unit-bottom').defineSizeMapping(mapSlot)
.addService(googletag.pubads())
.setTargeting('size', '{embed:size}')
.setTargeting('pos', '{embed:id}')
.setTargeting('url', window.location.pathname)
.setTargeting('location','Footer'.replace(/\\/g,''))
.setTargeting('entry','71744')
.setTargeting('categories', [
])
}
googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad({
fetchMarginPercent: 100,
renderMarginPercent: 0
});
googletag.enableServices();
googletag.display('gpt-unit-bottom');}); // /googletag.cmd.push
      </script>
     </div>
    </section>

     <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8">
      <div class="row footer-panels">
       <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-3" data-lpos="Global Footer | New in NYC">
        <button aria-controls="collapseNewInNYC" aria-expanded="false" class="btn btn-default btn-block btn-expand visible-xs-block collapsed" data-target="#collapseNewInNYC" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">

        </button>
        <div class="list-group collapse" id="collapseNewInNYC">
         <h4 class="column-title hidden-xs presentation">
          New in NYC
         </h4>

          What's Open in NYC
         </a>

          All in NYC: Staycation Guides

          Coronavirus Information

         </a>
         <a class="no-underline" href="https://coalition.nycgo.com" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
          Recovery Coalition
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-3" data-lpos="Global Footer | Explore">
        <button aria-controls="collapseExplore" aria-expanded="false" class="btn btn-default btn-block btn-expand visible-xs-block collapsed" data-target="#collapseExplore" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">
         Explore
        </button>

           <a href="/company-information/terms-of-use" target="_blank" title="Terms of Use link">

             Yes, I'd like to receive newsletters and offers from NYCgo.com and partners.
            </label>

             I agree to the
             <a href="https://business.nycgo.com/terms-of-use/" target="_blank" title="Terms of Use">

        <div class="newsletter-confirmation row">
         <div class="col-xs-12">
          <h4 class="h2">
           It's Official!
          </h4>
          <p>
           You're now subscribed to nycgo.com's newsletters.
          </p>

       <div class="follow-us-block">
        <h3>
         Follow Us
        </h3>
        <div class="sm">
         <a class="no-underline" href="https://twitter.com/nycgo" target="_blank" title="Follow Twitter">
          <span class="hidden-text">
           Follow us on Twitter
          </span>
          <i class="icon icon-twitter" title="Twitter">
          </i>
         </a>
         <a class="no-underline" href="https://www.facebook.com/nycgo" target="_blank" title="Like Facebook">
          <span class="hidden-text">
           Like us on Facebook
          </span>
          <i class="icon icon-facebook" title="Facebook">
          </i>
         </a>
         <a class="no-underline" href="https://www.instagram.com/nycgo/" target="_blank" title="Follow Instagram">
          <span class="hidden-text">
           Follow us on Instagram
          </span>
          <i class="icon icon-instagram" title="Instagram">

         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="separator">
    </div>

  <script>
   // Override hero header height and opacity from lv_homepage_tourism_campaign_callout
// var isMobile = window.matchMedia("(max-width: 767px)").matches;// Initial page settings
nycgoSettings.heroOpacity = '.40' || 20;
nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight = '520' || 720;var cssRules;
// height
if (nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight) {
// cssRules = `.homepage-hero { height: ${nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight}px  }; \n`
cssRules += `.homepage-hero .overlay { height: ${nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight}px }; \n`
cssRules += `.homepage-hero .video-wrapper { height: ${nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight}px }; \n`
}// opacity
if (nycgoSettings.heroOpacity) {
cssRules += `.homepage-hero .overlay { height: ${nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight}px };`;
cssRules += `.homepage-hero .overlay-bg { height: ${nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight}px };`;
cssRules += `.homepage-hero .overlay-bg::after { opacity: ${nycgoSettings.heroOpacity} };`;
}// apply styles
// $(function() {
if (nycgoSettings.heroOpacity || nycgoSettings.heroHeaderHeight) {
$('head').append('<style>' + cssRules + '</style>');
}
// });
  </script>
  <script>
   (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');// Creates an adblock detection plugin.
ga('provide', 'adblockTracker', function(tracker, opts) {
var ad = document.createElement('ins');
ad.className = 'AdSense';
ad.style.display = 'block';
ad.style.position = 'absolute';
ad.style.top = '-1px';
ad.style.height = '1px';
document.body.appendChild(ad);
tracker.set('dimension' + opts.dimensionIndex, !ad.clientHeight);
document.body.removeChild(ad);
});ga('create', 'UA-35788498-1', 'auto');
ga('require', 'adblockTracker', {dimensionIndex: 1});
ga('send', 'pageview');
  </script>

   _satellite.pageBottom();

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var _sf_async_config={uid:115,domain:"nycgo.com",useCanonical:true};
(function(){
function loadChartbeat() {
window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
var e = document.createElement('script');
e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript');
e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js');
document.body.appendChild(e);
}
var oldonload = window.onload;
window.onload = (typeof window.onload != 'function') ?
loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
})();
  </script>
  <script src="//cdn.getsmartcontent.com/1C9H1VQV.js">
  </script>
